PHRASE.LANG: kDesc

This fantastic bundle comes complete with the iconic Terminator full body outfit and a locomotion object containing a custom walk and run animation. This bundle includes: 

 * T2: Judgment Day – The Terminator (Male) 
 * T2: Judgment Day - The Terminator Locomotion 


※Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

Ce lot formidable comporte le costume intégral emblématique du Terminator et un objet de transport à l’animation personnalisée de course et de marche. Ce lot comprend : 

 * T2 : Le Jugement Dernier – Terminator (Homme) 
 * T2 : Le Jugement Dernier – Transport Terminator 


※À l’achat, tous les objets seront ajoutés à leurs catégories respectives. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

Dieses fantastische Bundle schließt das kultige Terminator-Ganzkörperoutfit und ein Lokomotion-Objekt mit einer individuellen Geh- und Lauf-Animation ein. Dieses Bundle umfasst: 

 * T2 - Tag der Abrechnung - Terminator (männlich) 
 * T2 - Tag der Abrechnung - Terminator-Lokomotion 


※Nach dem Kauf werden alle Gegenstände zur entsprechenden Kategorie hinzugefügt. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

Questo fantastico pacchetto offre l'iconico completo di Terminator e un oggetto di locomozione contenente animazioni di camminata e di corsa personalizzate. Questo pacchetto include: 

 * T2: Il giorno del giudizio – Terminator (uomo) 
 * T2: Il giorno del giudizio - Locomozione Terminator 


※Dopo l'acquisto, gli articoli verranno aggiunti alle categorie corrispondenti. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

Este fantástico paquete viene con el icónico atuendo de cuerpo entero del Terminator y un objeto de locomoción con una animación personalizada para caminar y correr. El paquete incluye: 

 * T2: el juicio final. El Terminator (hombre). 
 * T2: el juicio final. Locomoción del Terminator. 


※Tras la compra, los objetos se añadirán a su categoría correspondiente. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

ターミネーターのアイコニックな全身コスチュームと歩行・走行の専用アニメーション搭載のロコモーションアイテムです。このアイテムを装備する事で、移動スピードがアップします。移動速度：◆◆◆◆◆
LMO（ロコモーション）はポータブルアイテムです。

本セットには、下記アイテムが含まれています。 
 * T2 – ターミネーター （男性用）/組み合わせ
 * LMO-T2 – ターミネーター/ポータブルアイテム 

 ※購入すると、該当カテゴリに各アイテムが追加されます。

 Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

이 환상적인 번들은 맞춤 걷기 및 달리기 동작을 포함하고 있는 터미네이터 특유의 전신 복장과 로코모션 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다. 이 번들은 다음 아이템을 포함합니다: 

 ●터미네이터 2: 심판의 날 - 터미네이터 (남성) 
 ●터미네이터 2: 심판의 날 - 터미네이터 로코모션 


※모든 아이템은 구입과 동시에 해당 카테고리에 추가됩니다. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

此精美組合包包括終結者的代表性全身套裝和擴充活動功能 — 其中包含特別行走和奔跑動作。此組合包包括：

 ●T2: Judgment Day — 終結者（男用）
 ●T2: Judgment Day — 終結者擴充活動功能 


※購買後，所有物品會加入相應的類別中。 Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]
